title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Making friends with Thor – Lodi, Wisconsin
content:
Photo submitted by Charles Sholdt, “Taken during a crisp fall morning outside of Lodi, Wisconsin, near Dane and Wuanakee. Great 40-mile ride through the Driftless terrain of south central Wisconsin. The goat, Thor, stays along the road to keep the grass and weeds down. He and I have gotten to be pals because I need

author: Kristi Benedict
